docs.text: Mathematical background Vectors Vectors are arrays of numbers ordered as a column: x = \begin{bmatrix}x_1 \\ x_2\end{bmatrix} x = \begin{bmatrix}x_1 \\ x_2\end{bmatrix} This is \alpha \alpha Matrices This is a matrix \begin{equation} \label{eq-1} x = 1 \end{equation} Please see \eqref{eq-1} See the model This is another \begin{equation} \label{optimality} \nabla f(x)=0 \end{equation} THis is referenced by \eqref{optimality}.
